item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJN/$FILE/cool.gif"</a>> Nice to have you back - hope you are enjoying the trip. Ignore my message re phone call - it was Maurice!! See you soon and look forward to simpson's<br/><br/><br/><br/>Mum</p>
